summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period from February 1, 2015, to February 28, 2015. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned, as well as instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
